Package Controller

Class ProjectSelectionController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ProjectSelectionController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectPopUpViewController.ProjectPopUpViewControllerListener, ProjectSelectionViewController.ProjectSelectionViewControllerListener
public class ProjectSelectionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProjectSelectionViewController.ProjectSelectionViewControllerListener, ProjectPopUpViewController.ProjectPopUpViewControllerListener
This class controls the Project Selection Screen, which is the screen where the user's projects are listed. The user can create, delete, copy, rename or share projects in this screen. When he clicks on a project, he is taken to the Main Page where he will be able to compile and modify his project.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
